sub_title: EMODnet Data Ingestion; expert in coastal zone management, marine policy and MSP
summary:
I am an environmental engineer with knowledge and experience in marine data and coastal environmental issues. I have been specialised in integrated coastal zone management (ICZM) and marine spatial planning (MSP), and worked for the adoption and implementation of EU maritime policies and strategies and international conventions requirements. Since 2001, I have been working in several EU research projects and studies. I have strong analytical and organisational skills, finding it easy to communicate and share ideas when working in a team. Other strong abilities are: networking,, organising events, marketing, mathematics, communication and consultation.

Involved in several   EU projects regarding the marine and coastal environment:
http://www.coastlearn.nl
http://www.eurosion.org
http://www.sea-search.net
http://www.seadatanet.org
http://www.blackseascene.net
http://www.plancoast.eu 
http://ec.europa.eu/environment/iczm/ourcoast.htm
http://www.oceanography.ucy.ac.cy/research/projects/sea-mobile/
http://www.emodnet-chemistry.eu/
http://www.seadatanet.org 
http://www.seadatacloud.org 
http://www.emodnet.ingestion.eu 


Co-author of the  CCC Book: Climate and Coastal Cooperation. 2011,   http://www.coastalcooperation.net 

Drafting of the Romanian ICZM STRATEGY , for the Ministry of Environment and Water Management 2006

https://discomap.eea.europa.eu/map/Data/Milieu/OURCOAST_306_RO/OURCOAST_306_RO_Doc_ICZMnationalStrategy.pdf  

Working in the following domains:
Integrated Coastal Zone Management, Marine Spatial Planning, Marine Protected Area
Coastal Protection, Marine Data Management.
